algorithm_technique: Breadth-First Search (BFS) to find connected components
Mathematical calculation based on component sums and sizes
problem_summary_simple: Sum the values of cells unreachable from other non-blocked cells for each cell.
problem_summary_technical: Identify connected components of non-blocked cells using BFS. Calculate total sum and size for each component, then derive remoteness based on these values.
key_insights: The problem can be rephrased: for each cell, sum values of all cells NOT in its connected component.
BFS is suitable for finding connected components in a grid.
Pre-calculating sums and counts for each component optimizes the final calculation.
